title.raw: Set up Goal Tracking in Google Ads

content.cxl_get_extended_main: Monitor the profitability of your campaigns to track how they are meeting your business objectives.

playbook_steps.title: In Google Ads, click on Tools and Settings and select Conversions, then click the + button.
Select the types of conversions that your business needs to track.
For website conversions: Create a conversion action by completing the prompts on the following screen.
Set up the tag to add to your website.
Create your App conversions.
Phone Calls Conversions
Go to your Conversion tab and check Tracking Status to ensure the tracking is working.
Periodically check your Conversions section to see if your goal tracking still has a status of Recording Conversions or No Recent Conversions.

content.cxl_get_extended_main: Connect with your audience and increase your following on Twitter.

playbook_steps.title: Set up a Twitter account with your complete name, a profile picture, and an attractive header image and a bio with industry-targeted keywords and social proof.
Participate in major and relevant Twitter chats to gain followers and use the advanced search feature to find relevant discussions
Use the trending tab and search function on Twitter to identify popular tweets, participate actively, connect with influencers, boost engagement, and curate content.
Use Tweetdeck to reach out to niche influencers and participate in their recent tweets by liking, commenting or retweeting.
Use Twitter Analytics to identify your top tweets and recycle them for more engagement and re-targeting.
Boost the reach of your top-performing tweets with Twitter ads.
Create a conversion funnel to warm up your Twitter traffic and build brand awareness before promoting products.
Create a Twitter landing page that is engaging and conversion-friendly to attract visitors and re-target them in the future.
Promote your Twitter landing page, schedule tweets in advance and diversify your tweet copy by doing these.
Engage with niche followers to grab attention, get feedback, and promote your product, using these tips

content.cxl_get_extended_main: Create better user experience and protect the value of your SEO efforts.

playbook_steps.title: Use the tool Screaming Frog to find broken internal links.
Create a spreadsheet using Excel or Google Sheets where you can export or copy and paste the Screaming Frog data on broken links to track your progress.
Determine which broken internal links are worth fixing by checking the traffic to each page in Google Analytics and record them in your spreadsheet.
Repair your broken internal links by redirecting them in your CMS.
Conduct a broken link audit on a monthly basis by repeating these steps every month.
